title: Apple Inc. stock rises Friday, still underperforms market
text:
Shares of Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -1.06%
       rose 1.55% to $191.56 Friday, on what proved to be an all-around great trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        -0.12%
       rising 1.70% to 15,310.97 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 1.05% to 37,863.80. This was the stock's second consecutive day of gains. Apple Inc. closed $8.06 below its 52-week high ($199.62), which the company achieved on December 14th. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Friday, as Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       rose 1.22% to $398.67, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +0.21%
       rose 2.06% to $147.97, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       rose 2.02% to $146.38. Trading volume (68.4 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 53.1 M.
